title: Ordering Food for Delivery by Phone

content.text: In this lesson, you'll learn how to order food for delivery over the phone. Let's start with the basics to place your order.

data.meaning: I would like to place an order

data.tip: The 'qui' sounds like 'kee' in English. The 's' is soft, like in 'see'.

content.title: Placing Your Order
content.setting: You are calling a pizzeria to order a pizza and a drink for dinner.

conversation_flow.title: Greet the pizzeria and state your purpose
Order a drink
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Una pizza de salami. Anotado. ¿Algo para beber?

content.text: Great! The pizzeria has your order. Now, you need to provide your personal details for the delivery.

content.title: Providing Your Details
content.setting: The conversation continues. The pizzeria needs your name and address to deliver the food.

conversation_flow.title: State your name
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Perfecto. Una pizza y una Coca-Cola. ¿A qué nombre, por favor?

extract_info.user_name: Extract the user's name from their message

conversation_flow.title: Provide your phone number
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Entendido. Y por último, necesito un número de teléfono.

content.text: Excellent work. They have all your details. Let's finish the call by asking for the price and delivery time.

data.meaning: How much is it in total?

content.title: Finalizing the Order
content.setting: Before hanging up, you want to confirm the price and how long you need to wait.

conversation_flow.title: Ask for the total price
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Gracias. Su pedido está casi listo. ¿Alguna otra pregunta?

conversation_flow.title: Thank the person and end the call
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Tarda unos 30 minutos. Su pedido está en camino.
